full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 95 of 197 2636
LCHCmax3 Dubin - direct
1 right?
2 A. That's correct.
3 Q. I take it traveling and being around Mr. Epstein after you stopped dating him -- let me back up.
4 When did you and Mr. Dubin get married?
5 A. We got married at 1994 on my birthday.
6 Q. And after 1994, did you and Mr. Dubin continue to be friendly with Mr. Epstein and travel with Mr. Epstein?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. After you had children with Mr. Dubin, did Mr. Epstein get to know your children?
9 A. Yes, he did.
10 Q. And were you and Mr. Dubin comfortable with the relationship between Mr. Epstein and your children?
11 A. Yes, we were.
12 Q. Did it appear to you that Mr. Epstein was fond of your children?
13 A. Yes, he was.
14 Q. And did it appear to you that your children were fond of Mr. Epstein?
15 A. Yes, they were.
16 Q. Would you describe the relationship between your children and Mr. Epstein as an uncle-like relationship?
17 A. I would.
18 Q. Did they have a nickname for Mr. Epstein?
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014201
